current_timestamp.description: The timestamp indicating the current time when the data was retrieved.

agents_online.description: The number of agents who are currently available and online in the queue.

average_wait_time.description: The average amount of time callers are waiting in the queue before being connected to an agent.

callbacks_waiting.description: The number of callback requests that are currently in the queue, waiting for agents to be available.

calls_waiting.description: The number of incoming calls that are currently waiting to be answered by agents.

embeddable_callbacks_waiting.description: The number of callback requests that are specifically designated for embedding in a webpage or application and are waiting in the queue.

longest_wait_time.description: The longest amount of time a caller has been waiting in the queue before being connected to an agent.
